title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, May 5, 2021
description: Nellie Bly was born May 5th, 1864. She reinvented investigative journalism with her exposé on life in a New York asylum, to which she got herself committed for ten days.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Nellie Bly was born May 5th, 1864. She reinvented investigative journalism with her exposé on life in a New York asylum, to which she got herself committed for ten days.
